channel.title: Change items that appear in invin when you first log on with a new acc
channel.description: how do i change them like i start with a long sword sheild bow arrows 100 noted lobs and 10k how would i add items to that?? im using a deltasourcee

item.title: Change items that appear in invin when you first log on with a new acc
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Try searching ‘10000’ in client.java, you’ll find it, it’ll say like

addItem (ITEM, 10000);

^ Lol, I’m tired, not sure if what’s in the code box is even correct.

Read full topic
item.source: Change items that appear in invin when you first log on with a new acc
